quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易通过词根“absolute”（绝对的）和后缀“-ism”（主义）过度直译，将“absolutism”误解为“绝对真理”或混淆其政治专制主义的特定含义。
quiz_item.sentence: The king's strict adherence to **absolutism** meant he would not allow any limits on his power, claiming it was granted by God alone.

option.definition: 绝对主义；专制主义（政治上主张绝对权威的理论）
绝对真理；完全正确的观点
